attributes.action: Hold Murdoch and tabloid media accountable for EU misinformation
attributes.background: Many who voted to Leave in the EU Referendum did so due to an onslaught of anti-immigrant and faux-patriotism propaganda by the British tabloid press. Although freedom of press is important, it is immoral to manipulate people with lies on this level. We demand an enquiry into the press structure.

rejection.details:
You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
